content.raw:
The jenkins builds have started, but they won't show up in the build status due to a permissions issue. I reported it as a [bug to bitbucket](https://bitbucket.org/site/master/issues/12462/build-status-for-pull-requests-submitted), but it is not yet fixed.

In the meantime, I think the build statuses will be updated properly if you give your fork write access to @osrf_jenkins
content.html:
The jenkins builds have started, but they won't show up in the build status due to a permissions issue. I reported it as a bug to bitbucket, but it is not yet fixed.

In the meantime, I think the build statuses will be updated properly if you give your fork write access to @osrf_jenkins
